thread.title: Newest Update for the Huawei Mate 9 will bring 10X Optical Zoom, latest Security Patches
thread.title_full: Newest Update for the Huawei Mate 9 will bring 10X Optical Zoom, latest Security Patches

author: Mishaal Rahman
title: Newest Update for the Huawei Mate 9 will bring 10X Optical Zoom, latest Security Patches
text: Members on our forums are reporting that a new update for the Huawei Mate 9 is showing up on Huaweiâ€™s OTA servers, labeled MHA-l29c636b158. The change log for the update mentions the inclusion of 10X optical camera zoom, up from 6X zoom, as well as optimizing the drawer homescreen display and incorporating the latest security patches. Follow the thread for more information about this upcoming update.
